modules.description: Builds and modifies SMTP connection configurations with username, password, hostname, and TLS settings. Accepts optional port, CA certificate file, or CA certificate directory for secure connections. Used to prepare SMTP client settings for email delivery with authentication and encryption.

Handles SMTP configuration and email construction with support for message headers, body formatting, and asynchronous sending. Operates on types such as email addresses, MIME parts, and SMTP server settings. Used to generate and dispatch transactional emails in web applications.

Manages SMTP client configurations with user authentication, hostname, and TLS settings. Supports optional port, CA certificate file, or directory for secure email delivery. Provides functions to construct and adjust connection parameters. Enables secure email transmission by setting up encrypted and authenticated SMTP sessions.
